def-en: In the context of the link prediction task, the task of predicting an object to answer a link prediction query in the form $(s,p,?)$.
def-ga: I gcomhthéacs an taisc réamhinsinte nasc, an tasc a bhaineann le cuspóir a réamhinsint chun ceist réamhinsinte nasc sa bhfoirm $(a,f,?)$ a fhreagairt.
notes: Féach chomh maith ar an téarma 'prediction / réamhinsint'.
